summary: Fixed race condition in Himalaya sidebar page navigation by adding request validation and debouncing. Stale async responses are now discarded when generation changes or page changes during fetch.

artifacts.summary: Added navigation request tracking, debounced refresh, and async callback validation

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed race condition in Himalaya sidebar page counter by implementing request validation with generation IDs and 50ms debouncing for cache-miss navigation. Stale async responses are discarded, preventing page content from mismatching the displayed page number during rapid <C-d>/<C-u> presses.

next_steps: Test changes by opening Neovim with Himalaya sidebar and rapidly pressing <C-d> or <C-u> to verify page counter stays synchronized with content
